titleStmt.title: Bread for the poor, or, A method shewing how the poor may be maintained and duly provided for in a far more plentiful and yet cheaper manner than now they are without waste or want.
titleStmt.author: R. D. (Richard Dunning)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Darker for Charles Yeo, John Pearce and Philip Bishop,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
